page.title: 15Education in 1985
page.content: We start our{Primary Education}at the age of{five.}We spend two years in the{Infants}then four years in the {Juniors.}We learn English and Maths every day, topic work(like Domesday Project and Science),music and physical education once a week and sometimes cooking. We work from 9 till 3.30 from Monday to Friday and have corporate worship every morning. In our{Secondary Education}we learn more subjects. In the{Fourth Year}we study about eight subjects for the Ordinary Level Examinations or Certificate of Secondary Education. In the{Sixth Form we specialise in two to four subjects for the Advanced Level Examinations. At{eighteen}we can go to college or University for three or four years to study for a diploma or degree. If you wish you can leave when you are{16}to get a job or study for a trade.
